channel.title: Frontend on Hugo Zettel
channel.description: Recent content in Frontend on Hugo Zettel

item.title: Hugo Zettelkasten
item.description:
Hugo theme for taking notes with the Zettelkasten method.

Zettelkasten can be considered as an extension to your brain where you process and store data and make connections between ideas.

item.title: Using NPM with Hugo
item.description: How to use NPM packages in Hugo? Prerequisites for Hugo Pipe’s PostCSS 1 npm install -g postcss-cli npm install -g autoprefixer

item.title: Tailwind CSS
item.description: Tailwind is a low-level CSS framework for building web pages with building blocks. unopinionated low-level utility classes work from HTML responsive component friendly customizable
